attributes.description: The Mazda CX30 is the latest addition to the Mazda range and is also our second 7th generation car. The Active is the starting point in the range. Some of the stunning features include, heads up display, dual zone climate control, LED lighting, auto lights and wipers, Apple Car Play/Android Auto, cruise control, drive away lock with a high quality and durable cloth interior. The CX30 also comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage Service Plan, Warranty, which can be extended and 3 year Roadside Assistance as standard

attributes.description: The CX5 is the bestselling car in the Mazda range and the Active Auto is the entry level auto in the 2.0 litre engine. The CX5 Active Auto offers a very good value proposition and good spec level, which includes a Cloth interior, Apple Car Play/Android Auto and Bluetooth, reverse camera, 17 wheel and tyre combo, driveway lock, cruise control and dual zone climate control which blows through to the rear. The CX5 comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage service plan and warranty, with the option of extending and roadside assistance for 3 years.
